survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of the Annual Tech Networking Conference to evaluate the event's effectiveness, organization, and overall attendee satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend this event again next year?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend this event again next year?

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make during the event?
questions.client_notes: Use predefined ranges for easier analysis. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make during the event?
